channel.title: Tut writing on screen

item.title: Tut writing on screen
item.dc:creator: @dustin-pkz dustin-pkz
item.description:
@dustin-pkz wrote:

ok so i got a source im not a good coder how do i change the tut writings like when i log in it says ~dds speced~ and stuff like that on screen how do i change the writing i got file and codes are…

sendQuest("@Blue@Ontop of middle", 14779);

sendQuest("@Green@Middle change text", 14787);
sendQuest("@Blue@Top corner change text", (14795);

thats what it says please tell me how to change it to what i want?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 09:27:22 pm[/size][hr]on the
sendQuest("@Blue@Ontop of middle", 14779);
sendQuest("@Green@Middle change text", 14787);
sendQuest("@Blue@Top corner change text", (14795); clours part it did say

sendQuest("@Blu@Ontop of middle", 14779);
sendQuest("@Gre@Middle change text", 14787);
sendQuest("@Blu@Top corner change text", (14795);
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 09:36:56 pm[/size][hr]also i dont know if this is against rules or anything im new to this site but i need to know how to like change what npc’s say and where they stand, my msn is droped@hotmail.com

Read full topic
